law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec. 39, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 476, Pt.V, sec. 365, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 10, effective January 1, 1977. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4092.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Tax on bank and trust company shares, except banker's bank organized under KRS 287.135.
